hopobject.name: CrashBone
hopobject.pname: CrashPlan on BeagleBone (Robust Data Backup Solution)
hopobject.body: Tutorial of how to get CrashPlan, a robust personal and enterprise level data backup solution running on the BeagleBone.
hopobject.shortdesc: Tutorial of how to get CrashPlan, a robust personal and enterprise level data backup solution running on the BeagleBone.
